data.comment: Display string for the project file extensions

The package load key assigned by the VSIP registration authority

data.comment: Error message for an empty file name.

data.name: InvalidFileNameInvalidChar
data.value: {0}: Invalid {0}. A file name cannot contain any of the following characters: /\:?"<>|
data.comment: Error message for invalid characters in a file name

data.name: InvalidIce
data.value: {0}: The {0} property you entered is not in a valid format.
data.comment: Error message for invalid list of ices

data.name: InvalidPath
data.value: {0}: Invalid {0}. A path cannot contain any of the following characters: *?"<>|
data.comment: Error message for invalid path

data.name: InvalidPreprocessorVariable
data.value: {0}: The {0} you entered is not in a valid format. The format must follow this pattern: <name>=<value>;<name>
data.comment: Error message for invalid preprocessor variables

data.name: InvalidWarnings
data.value: {0}: The {0} you entered is not in a valid format. The format must follow this pattern: <number>;<number>
data.comment: Error message for invalid warnings

data.name: InvalidWixVariables
data.value: {0}: The {0} you entered is not in a valid format. The format must follow this pattern: <name>=<value>;<name>=<value>
data.comment: Error message for invalid wix variables

data.name: CatastrophicError
data.value: A catastrophic error has occurred and the process was terminated.
data.comment: Shown when Visual Studio is about to crash because of a StackOverflowError or some other unrecoverable exception.

data.name: WixReferenceInvalid
data.value: A reference to {0} could not be added. Please make sure that the file is accessible, and that it is a valid WiX reference.
data.comment: Shown when the Wix reference to be added is invalid or inaccessible.
